metadata.title: Thursday, 14th March, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) what measures the Government intends to implement to address the escalating road traffic accidents reported to be at 9,888, as of third quarter of 2023, countrywide; and
(b) what the major causes of the accidents were.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a recreation centre in Kapoche Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct an embankment between Namwala town and Kafue River in Namwala District to prevent flooding;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) when the Government last funded the Zambia News and Information Services (ZANIS) Department in Kalabo District;
(b) how much money was released towards the operations of ZANIS from January to May, 2023; and
(c) whether there are any plans to increase funding to ensure that the operations of ZANIS in the District are efficient.
(a) how much land, countrywide, in percentage terms, was being utilised for agriculture purposes as of June, 2023;
(b) what the tonnage of maize produced by small scale farmers, countrywide was, from 2018 to 2022, year by year; and
(c) what the contribution of agricultural produce to the Gross Domestic Product was, as of August, 2023.

questions.minister: Minister ofInfrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the tarring of the Chama - Lundazi road will commence; and
(b) what the time frame for the completion of the project, is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to procure the following for Mitete District Hospital:
(i) an ambulance; and (ii) a motorized boat;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why. ___________________________
